result.reason: In fullscreen mode, SetResolution() applies ResolutionScalingFactor on top of Screen.Bounds which already accounts for DPI, causing understated RDP resolution on high-DPI displays (e.g. 1536x864 instead of 1920x1080 at 125% scaling).
result.approach: In SetResolution(), for Fullscreen paths, remove the redundant ResolutionScalingFactor multiplication from screen.Bounds dimensions — Screen.Bounds already returns the correct pixel values for the monitor, and double-applying DPI scaling causes the understated resolution.
